title: More Comic Book Shows on Netflix? - Kinda Funny Morning Show 08.04.17
description:
Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

Out is actually a pretty phenomenal cook, so we had a great time. But it was a shoot, man. Give me the details. I mean, over to his house at 9:00 a.m., uh, setting up the shots. Greg had everything prepped. We worked from 9 till about 7 the first day, uh, at which point Jen Marar texted me and said, "Hey, we're all coming over from Paula's bridal shower. Yeah, should we come over now, we're hammered, or should you want us to wait until you're done?" So she paid me that nice courtesy. I'm like, "Well, it's your house; you can do whatever you want." She's like, "No, no, but you guys are shooting. I don't want a rager," and so I was like, "If you guys don't mind, like waiting till 6:30ish that would be great." Joey came over, and then Kevin came over. Yeah, it was fun; it was uh ridiculous. I I was in bed, mhm, sleeping because I could. It was my first weekend in.

* "ta ****" → "ta ***(asterisk)***
* "tail taale" → "tail tale"
* "**** advice" → "good advice" (implied, but not explicitly stated)
* "Jon Snow's like I'm Jon Snow" → no change (idiomatic expression)
* "what should I should do" → no change (redundant phrase, likely for emphasis)
* "going going through the different options" → no change (likely a pause or stutter in speech)
* "**** try to overthrow you" → "try to overthrow you" (removed profanity)
